medium_consistency.question: Which team did the player Giles Ecclestone belong to from 2002 to 2004?
forward_steps: Identify the team they played for.
Identify the year they played for the team.
Determine if the team they played for was the same as the team they belong to.
Determine if the team they belong to is the same as the team they played for.
The player's name is Giles Ecclestone.
The team is the same as the team they played for, which is the same as the team they belong to.
The player played for the team from
backward_steps: Identify the year in which the player played.
Determine the location of the team the player played for.
Identify the location and determine if the answer is correct.
The name of the player is Giles Ecclestone.
Identify the location of the team the player played for. The player played for a team in Cambridgeshire.
